title: Launch Audio Feed - Confirm Appearance
custom_expected: Confirm: +background matching game's current venue displays with Teams, date, team logos and radio broadcast info +feed launches as expected; expected audio plays In Player UI displays: ++ Linescore (if scores are ON), other wise data is replaced by "-" ++ Games (Todays games)

title: Audio Feed Playback
custom_steps: Confirm audio plays through from near beginning to completion.
custom_expected: Audio plays back as expected and jumps out to view launched from upon completion.

title: Linescore does not appear with Hide Scores ON
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to Linescore option

need Test Case Result Image
custom_expected:
THEN Linescore is removed.

need Test Case Expected Result Image

title: Verify pre-roll cannot be skipped
custom_steps: When pre/mid-roll ad is playing: attempt to Scan fwd or Skip forward though the ad
custom_expected: The user cannot FF through an ad, but can pause and back-navigate. If the user rewinds past or to an ad that has already played once, the ad is skipped. (If the user then leaves the player page and returns, the ad will be shown again)

title: Verify pre-roll only plays once per video launch; once the ad completes, user cannot scan back to it
Verify transition from ad to video playback is smooth (i.e. no waiting)
